title: ROI Calculator — Main Interface

macro_bets.description: Provide accurate ROI projections with realistic scaling models
Quick deployment using Next.js + existing component patterns

jtbd.situation: evaluating CRO investment for budget approval

jtbd.motivation: demonstrate potential value of CRO services

checks.label: Heading distinction
checks.notes: Clear h1 with gradient text, section headers with dots

checks.label: Primary action clarity
checks.notes: Green CTAs stand out against dark background

checks.label: Color hierarchy
checks.notes: Green for positive/CRO, Purple for scaling, Gray for current

checks.label: Chart implementation period
checks.notes: Shaded zone + vertical line highlights first 3 months

checks.label: Elevation/shadows
checks.notes: Layered shadows on cards and buttons

checks.label: Typography system
checks.notes: DM Sans for display, Space Mono for numbers

checks.label: Keyboard operability
checks.notes: All inputs and buttons keyboard accessible

checks.label: Visible focus states
checks.notes: Green ring on focus for inputs

checks.label: Color contrast (4.5:1)
checks.notes: Labels improved to 0.7 opacity, some sublabels still borderline

checks.label: ARIA labels
checks.notes: aria-label on sliders, aria-pressed on toggles

checks.label: Screen reader support
checks.notes: Chart not fully accessible to screen readers

checks.label: Feature discoverability
checks.notes: Clear input labels and section headers

checks.label: Feedback on actions
checks.notes: Sliders update instantly, but no confirmation on value clamp

checks.label: Validation feedback
checks.notes: Silent clamping, no explicit error messages

priority_fixes.title: Add chart accessibility
priority_fixes.description: Chart data not accessible to screen readers. Add aria-label or data table alternative.

priority_fixes.title: Add validation feedback
priority_fixes.description: When values are clamped, show brief toast or inline message explaining the adjustment.

priority_fixes.title: Add reset to defaults
priority_fixes.description: Allow users to quickly reset all inputs to default values for new calculations.

priority_fixes.title: Add chart loading skeleton
priority_fixes.description: Show skeleton while chart renders to prevent layout shift perception.

priority_fixes.title: Improve sublabel contrast
priority_fixes.description: Some metric sublabels (0.35 opacity) don't meet WCAG AA. Increase to 0.5+.

notes: Strong visual design with excellent glassmorphism execution. Main gaps are in accessibility (chart) and feedback (validation). The CVR degradation model and implementation period visualization add credibility to projections. Recommend addressing priority fixes 1-3 before production launch.
